content.p: Assistant Professor, Lectures I have lectured on the following modules in the Faculty of Science. (* denotes previous years) Visual Cognition, Visual Perception and Cognitive Neuroscience. Gaze movements, eye movements and visuomotor coordination of humans (and a captive bred Orangutan) in natural environments. Stress and Anxiety Colour vision and food preference. The perception of faces. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
